hooks.command: osascript -e 'display notification "Claude Code has finished" with title "Claude Code" sound name "Glass"'

YEAR=$(date +%Y); if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" != *"$YEAR"* && "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" != *"latest"* && "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" != *"current"* ]]; then echo "Consider adding $YEAR to search for current results"; fi

FILE="$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$FILE" == *.js || "$FILE" == *.ts || "$FILE" == *.jsx || "$FILE" == *.tsx || "$FILE" == *.json || "$FILE" == *.jsonc ]]; then if command -v biome &>/dev/null || [ -f "$(dirname "$FILE")/biome.json" ] || [ -f "$(dirname "$FILE")/biome.jsonc" ]; then npx @biomejs/biome check --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; elif command -v eslint &>/dev/null; then npx eslint "$FILE" --fix 2>/dev/null || true; fi; elif [[ "$FILE" == *.swift ]]; then if command -v swiftlint &>/dev/null; then swiftlint lint --fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; elif [[ "$FILE" == *.py ]]; then if command -v pylint &>/dev/null; then pylint "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; elif [[ "$FILE" == *.rb ]]; then if command -v rubocop &>/dev/null; then rubocop "$FILE" --autocorrect 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi

FILE="$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$FILE" == *.md || "$FILE" == *.svelte || "$FILE" == *.vue || "$FILE" == *.html || "$FILE" == *.css || "$FILE" == *.scss ]]; then if command -v prettier &>/dev/null; then npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi
